channel.title: How do u add items in shop
channel.description: how do i add items in shop with a certain price???

item.title: How do u add items in shop
item.dc:creator: @jarrell1022 jarrell1022
item.description:
@jarrell1022 wrote:

to add them to a shop that exist already simply go into shops.cfg and search (ctrl+f) for the shop name, then go over and put in the items id (4151 is whip)
then the tab button and the amount to change prices go into item . cfg and search for the item then look for the price and change it

Read full topic
item.source: How do u add items in shop
